thread.title: An 86-year-old millionaire buried treasure in the Rockies—and he’s offered one main clue

title: An 86-year-old millionaire buried treasure in the Rockies—and he’s offered one main clue
text: An 86-year-old millionaire buried treasure in the Rockies—and he’s offered one main clue CNBC • An 86-year-old millionaire buried treasure in the Rockies—and he’s offered one main clue More Somewhere in the Rocky mountains, in the roughly 1,000 miles between Santa Fe, New Mexico, and the Canadian border, may be a hidden treasure chest whose contents are worth millions. The man who claims to have hidden the fortune back in 2010 is Forrest Fenn, now 86, a former Vietnam fighter pilot and art dealer. Fenn estimates that as many as 350,000 people have gone hunting for the treasure, he tells CNBC Make It, adding that there is no way of knowing whether anyone has actually gotten close. "It could be found soon or 1,000 years from now," he says. "No one knows where that treasure chest is but me," Fenn told NPR in 2016. That includes his wife. "If I die tomorrow, the knowledge of that location
